comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@DamirAinullin**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Wow!  I wonder how long that bug has been in there?  Good catch.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: It's possible it's never null because of how the parameter binder works.  At any rate, nice find, thanks for the fix.
